title: Reporting your tax code as wrong

details.description: How to tell HM Revenue & Customs that your tax code isn't right - National Insurance number, PAYE, payslip
details.body:
Tell HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) if your tax code is wrong. Youâ€™ll need to give them your National Insurance number and your PAYE reference - you can find these on your payslip.
